talk.author: did:plc:yno6xba5cp6tvs24i4kxjhri
talk.utter: It wasn't the hatred I felt for X. It was disappointment in smart people who parrot russian propaganda.

talk.author: did:plc:qyhclxxxassc3vkq3kfvzwtv
talk.utter: There ale people that oppose that propaganda and I see both sides. The correct answer to bad speech is good speech and seeing both is awesome.  Society working on the problems. Censorship at the other hand just hides the problem. You put your head into the sand. It's sad, but that's your decision.

talk.author: did:plc:yno6xba5cp6tvs24i4kxjhri
talk.utter: I am exposed to the real suffering of Ukrainians every day. 380k of them live here in Prague. I give some of them jobs and hear their stories. I don't need to build the network of a billionaire who mocks people who are struggling to survive.
